channel.title: Music I like Boards of canada => Helios => Goldmund => post-classical piano musi
channel.description:
Somebody on irc (Think it was SPPT) linked me to boards of canada and I fell in love with their music. My housemate heard and said I'd probably like Helios. I love them as well now. The composer(helios) also releases music under another name called goldmund.
It's sort of post-classical piano music and my main reason posting here was to see if anyone knows any similar music.
http://soundcloud.com/keithkenniff/goldmund-threnody/
KeithKenniff (composer of Helios and Goldmund) has this soundcloud account and he has so much stuff on there that I love.

item.title: Music I like Boards of canada => Helios => Goldmund => post-classical piano musi
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

If you like Boards of Canada try Aphex Twin.

There music varies; try other songs too.

Read full topic
